topic.title: Qualifying Service Boolean Detail - conformance rules

section.p: Military service information or condition obtained from the enrollment application in the form of a yes/no answer to a question.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Boolean
The answer to a yes/no question.

Contains exactly one [1..1] detailCode with data type Code
A specific military service question from the enrollment application.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status of this act.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for this question.

Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type Boolean
The answer to a yes/no question.
